nodes.text: The TLB power converter was manufactured by Koensayr Manufacturing, and was part of the power system of the Millennium Falcon when the vessel was owned by Han Solo.

Gaor Tembon had installed six converters in his modified freighter Miv'rah Firestorm to handle the increased power from the power core. However, to hide the increased power from custom inspectors, he would shunt 30% of the energy to the converters and cause them to blow out.
